48.ara-name: كتاب الدعوات عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Anas narrated that the Prophet (ﷺ) said:“Be constant with: ‘O Possessor of Majesty and Honor (Yā Dhal-Jalāli wal-Ikrām).’”

chapter.eng-name: The Statement: “O Living! O Self-Sustaining Sustainer!” And Being Constant With Saying: “O Possessor Of Majesty And Honor”
